solution_line_template: Addison sold {tickets_sold_friday} x {multiplier_saturday} = <<{tickets_sold_friday}*{multiplier_saturday}={tickets_sold_saturday}>>{tickets_sold_saturday} raffle tickets on Saturday.

She sold {tickets_sold_saturday} on Saturday - {tickets_sold_sunday} on Sunday = <<{tickets_sold_saturday}-{tickets_sold_sunday}={difference_saturday_sunday}>>{difference_saturday_sunday} more on Saturday than Sunday.
